select pd_id as id, c_id as cId, pd_name as name, pd_price as price, pd_description as desc, pd_quantity as quantity, pd_wholesals as wholesals, pd_dcRate as dcRate, pd_isMaintain as isMaintain, pd_retetionDate as retetionDate from MORANMORAN.PRODUCT LIMIT #{start}, #{pageNum}

select pd_id as id, c_id as cId, pd_name as name, pd_price as price, pd_description as desc, pd_quantity as quantity, pd_wholesals as wholesals, pd_dcRate as dcRate, pd_isMaintain as isMaintain, pd_retetionDate as retetionDate from MORANMORAN.PRODUCT where pd_id = #{id}

select pd_id as id, c_id as cId, pd_name as name, pd_price as price, pd_description as desc, pd_quantity as quantity, pd_wholesals as wholesals, pd_dcRate as dcRate, pd_isMaintain as isMaintain, pd_retetionDate as retetionDate from MORANMORAN.PRODUCT_IMG where pd_id = #{pd_id}
